sources.title: The Little Dragons (1979)
sources.description: Karate experts attempt to rescue a girl who was kidnapped by a mother and her two psycho sons. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-little-dragons-1979/

metadata.Plot: A grandfather takes his two young grandsons on a camping trip for their karate tournament, and become involved in a kidnapping by a poor country family that lives in the woods.
metadata.Writer: Harvey Applebaum, Louis G. Atlee, Rudolph Borchert
metadata.Actors: Charles Lane, Ann Sothern, Chris Petersen
